Count the distinct number of field values that exist per the given field to group by

Source: R/MultimediaClient-wrapper.r
multimedia_count_distinct_values_per_group.Rd

This is a wrapper function for count_distinct_values_per_group from class nbaR.MultimediaClient.

multimedia_count_distinct_values_per_group(group = NULL, field = NULL,
  returnType = "data.frame", ...)

Arguments

group

name of field in the multimedia object you want to group by, type:
field

name of field in the multimedia object, type:
returnType

Either 'list' or 'data.frame', defaults to 'data.frame'
...

additional parameters passed to count_distinct_values_per_group from class nbaR.MultimediaClient

Value

scalar

Details

See also endpoint /getDistinctValuesPerGroup

See also

Other nbaR.MultimediaClient-wrappers: multimedia_count_distinct_values, multimedia_count, multimedia_download_query, multimedia_find_by_ids, multimedia_find, multimedia_get_distinct_values_per_group, multimedia_get_distinct_values, multimedia_get_field_info, multimedia_get_paths, multimedia_get_settings, multimedia_get_setting, multimedia_is_operator_allowed, multimedia_query
